parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of the row in which the cell is located

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of the column in which the cell is located

title: ITableAnnotation.GetCellTextFormat
description: Gets the text format for the specified cell in this table.
signature:
TextFormat GetCellTextFormat( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of the row in which the cell is located

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of the column in which the cell is located

remarks: The index for both the rows and columns is 0-based.
